data.title: List of FM Radio Stations in Qatar (2024)
data.meta_description: This article lists the popular English, Arabic, Hindi, Malayalam, Filipino, Srilankan, Urdu and French FM Radio Stations in Qatar with their contact details.
data.text:
Doha Guides Team regularly reviews this article to ensure the content is up-to-date and accurate. The last editorial review and update were on 02 February 2024.

In recent years, the Qatar Government has given operational licenses to a number of private FM Radio stations in various languages. With thousands of residents listening while driving or at work, these radio stations have become an essential part of our daily life.

This article lists the popular English, Arabic, Hindi, Malayalam, Filipino, Srilankan, Nepalese, Urdu, Bangla, Spanish, and French FM Radio Stations in Qatar with their contact details.

Hindi FM Radio Stations in Qatar

Radio Olive 106.3 FM

Radio Olive 106.3 FM is the first private Hindi FM station to air in Qatar. Radio Olive aims to provide the best of information, music, and entertainment to the diaspora from the Indian Sub-Continent.

Address: Al Ezz Tower 3, Al Safiliya Street, Corniche Road, Doha. Phone: +974 44123133. Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.olive.qa

Mirchi One 89.6 FM

Marchi One is run by Mirchi, the biggest entertainment company from India with 38 million strong listeners on the Radio and 60 million Monthly Active Users spread across multiple digital platforms. In partnership with One FM, Mirchi will introduce its radio and digital platforms across Qatar and offer the greatest listening experience in Hindi and Bollywood music straight from across 63 cities in India.

Address: Floor 3, Shama 58 Building, Ibn Seena Street, Munthaza, Doha

Listen live online: www.mirchione.com

Malayalam FM Radio Stations in Qatar

Radio Malayalam 98.6 FM

Radio Malayalam 98.6 FM, the first private FM radio in Qatar, went on air on 31st October 2017. Radio Malayalam targets the largest expatriate community of Qatar – the Keralites, who hail from the southern state of India and speak the Malayalam language. The Radio broadcasts a variety of programs that include updates, information, entertainment, educational matters music etc.

Address: 4th Floor, Office 1, Markaz Al Mana Building, Doha. Phone: +974 444 22 986. Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.radio986.com

Radio Suno 91.7 FM

Radio Suno 91.7 FM is the first Malayalam FM radio station to be aired from Qatar. With the best On-Air and production teams on board, Radio Suno aim to provide the best of information, entertainment, and music to our South Indian diaspora.

Address: Al Ezz Tower 3, Al Safiliya Street, Corniche Road, Doha. Phone: +974 44123133. Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.suno.qa

Filipino FM Radio Stations in Qatar

Qabayan Radio 94.3 FM

Qabayan Radio is the first and the only Filipino radio station in Qatar with a commercial broadcast license under Tagalog Channel W.L.L. which went on air on 25th March 2019 – a considered milestone for the entire Pinoy expatriate community in Qatar. It was established to promote music and entertainment with a Filipino touch that is always on-trend, timely and relevant, a hybrid of western and oriental influence.

Address: Room 301, Bldg. 44, Al Dafaf St., Al Sadd, Doha. Tel: +974 4499 4944, Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.qabayanfm.com

Nepalese Radio in Qatar

Radio Olive Nepal (online)

Radio Olive Nepal by Olive Suno Network is an online radio for the Nepalese community in Qatar. With the best Nepalese on-air talents and production teams on board, Radio Olive Nepal is determined to have its Nepali family entertained and informed at all times, with just a click of a button. Available online through the Radio Olive website as well as on the Shoof app, you can listen to Radio Olive Nepal anytime, anywhere.

Address: Al Ezz Tower 3, Al Safiliya Street, Corniche Road, Doha. Phone: +974 4444 1063

Listen live online: www.olive.qa/radio-olive-nepal-listen-live/

QFM Nepal (online)

QFM Nepal by QFM Radio Network is an online radio for the Nepalese community in Qatar. QFM Nepal broadcasts Nepalese entertainment and infotainment programs through their website.

Listen live online: www.qfmradio.qa/nepal

Srilankan & Tamil Radio Stations in Qatar

QFM 95.3 Sithula Radio & QFM Tamil Radio

QFM 95.3 Sithula is Qatar’s first Srilankan Radio station and the only Srilankan FM Radio in the Middle East. QFM Sithula and QFM Tamil function under Qatar’s Ministry of Culture & Sports, using Qatar Media Corporation’s transmission facilities. QFM Sithula broadcasts in Sinhalese and targets the Sri Lankan expatriate community in Qatar.

Listen live online: www.sithularadio.com

Radio Suno Lanka (online)

Radio Suno Lanka is the first-ever Sinhalese and Tamil radio station online that is aired from the State of Qatar. Radio Suno Lanka produces the best content for its Sinhalese and Tamil listeners, to keep them hooked and informed with a feel of a home. Available online through the Radio Suno website, you can listen to Radio Suno Lanka anytime, anywhere.

Address: Al Ezz Tower 3, Al Safiliya Street, Corniche Road, Doha. Phone: +974 4444 1063

Listen live online: www.suno.qa/radio-suno-lanka-listen-live

Q Tamil Radio (online)

Q Tamil Radio is a popular online Radio Channel based in Doha, Qatar. Q Tamil Radio plays various types of Children’s/Family and Youth Education, Information and Entertainment shows. The radio channel is continuously developing its playlists based on audience feedback.

Tel: +974-77595925, Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: https://qtamilradio.com/

Urdu Radio Stations in Qatar

Urdu Radio 107 FM

Urdu Radio 107 FM is Qatar’s first Urdu language radio station. It is being managed by Qatar Media Corporation (QMC), the official broadcasting authority for the State of Qatar.

Tel: +974-4413 1280, 44874299

Listen live online: www.urduradio.qa

Bangla Radio Stations in Qatar

QFM 95.3 Bangla

QFM 95.3 Bangla broadcasts in Bangla and targets the Bangladesh expatriate community in Qatar. QFM Bangla functions under Qatar’s Ministry of Culture & Sports, using Qatar Media Corporation’s transmission facilities.

Listen live online: www.qfmradio.qa/bangla

English FM Radio Stations in Qatar

QBS English 97.5 FM

The QBS English Service Radio was launched at the end of 1971 to cater to the English-speaking communities in Qatar. During that time, QBS Radio broadcasted daily for one hour but eventually moved up to include three live shows. Gradually, those early beginnings turned into a variety of programs and segments that touch upon several topics.

Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.qbsradio.qa

French FM Radio Stations in Qatar

Oryx Radio 94 FM

Oryx Radio 94 FM is a French radio service in Qatar that launched in January 2011. It is a partnership between Radio France Internationale and Qatar Media Corp., which also operates the English-language radio station QBS. The station focuses on local news services including news updates at the top of each hour.

Address: Wadi AlSail, TV Roundabout, Doha, Tel: +974 5031 4747, Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.oryxradio.qa

Spanish and Portuguese Radio Station in Qatar

Golfo Radio 98.3 FM

Golfo Radio is the first Spanish and Portuguese language radio in the Middle East. The radio’s aim is to disseminate the cultural diversity of Spain, Portugal, Latin American and Caribbean countries through its diverse range of entertainment, educational and musical programs. Golfo Radio 98.3 FM was broadcast for the first time in March 2019.

Address: P.O. Box 35192, Doha, Qatar, Tel: +974 4414442, Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.golforadio.com

Hola Qatar Radio 92.0

Qatar Media Corporation (QMC) launched Qatar’s first Spanish radio, ‘Hola Qatar’ in November 2022. The new station will complement the existing QMC radio stations in Arabic, English and Urdu languages. The aim is to reach the Hispanic audience, especially during the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022.

Website: www.holaqatar.qa

Arabic FM Radio Stations in Qatar

Qatar Radio 90.8 FM, 96 FM, 104 FM

Qatar Radio is a group of public-service national radio stations in Qatar which is owned and run by the public-service broadcasting network Qatar General Broadcasting and Television Corporation (QGBTC).

Listen live online: www.qatarradio.qa

Al Rayyan Radio 102 FM

Al Rayyan Radio was launched in July 2007 to provide musical content focusing on the region’s rich culture in particular and in the Arab world in general. The Radio regularly broadcasts many events celebrating the musical heritage, and folk singing sessions and performances are organized weekly in Souq Waqif.

Address: Second Floor, Al-Rayyan Media and Marketing Company, Abdulla bin Jassim Street, Doha. Phone: + 974 4424 0267 / 0275 / 0445, Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.alrayyan.qa

Saout Al Khaleej 100.8 FM

Sout Al Khaleej is an Arabic radio station established by the director of Qatar Broadcasting and Television Corporation, H.E. Sheikh Hamad Bin Thamir Al Thani. The station airs various shows covering a wide range of topics, including politics, business & economic culture, fashion and entertainment. The station first aired on 2 February 2002.

Listen live online: www.soutalkhaleej.fm

Mazaji 94.6 FM

Mazaji 94.6 FM is a popular Arabic language entertainment radio broadcasting from Doha. Mazaji was launched on December 18, 2018. Mazaji radio brings to Qatar a contemporary and trendsetting programme grid that includes a variety of songs and other music.

Listen live online: www.mazaji.fm

Fame FM 99.9

FAME FM Qatar is a newborn Arabic entertainment radio station in Qatar. It is the sister concern of FAME FM Lebanon Radio Station. Their music is Levantine, Arabic and English from UK and US charts.

Address: 16 Al Rawabi Street, Doha, Qatar, Tel: +974 333 80 188

Listen live online: www.famefmqatar.com

Inta FM 103.7

Inta FM is a Qatar-based Arabic radio station focusing on entertainment and plays regional songs.

Contact: +974 44323222, 30161616 – Email: [email protected]

Listen live online: www.intafm.com

Listen Live To News Channels in Qatar

Al Jazeera English

Al Jazeera Arabic

List of FM Radio Stations in Qatar

Do let us know in the comments section if any radio station has been left out, and we can add them to the list.
